text: Hydroperoxide is the functional group: an oxygen atom bonded to another oxygen atom which is itself bonded to a hydrogen atom. Organic compounds that have this group are also called hydroperoxides. A chemical that has a hydroperoxide connected to an acyl group is called an organic peroxy acid. Hydroperoxides are chemical unstable compounds. A technical usage of such compounds is the sharpless epoxidation. == References == Category:Organic compounds Category:Oxygen compounds
title: Hydroperoxide
